org.divxdede.swing.busy

Class DefaultBusyModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.DefaultBoundedRangeModel
      • org.divxdede.swing.busy.DefaultBusyModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, BoundedRangeModel, BusyModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FutureBusyModel

    public class DefaultBusyModel
extends DefaultBoundedRangeModel
implements BusyModel
    Default Implementation of interface BusyModel.

    It add AutoCompletion feature for determinate model. This feature allow to move the current value to the minimum range when the busy property is set to true.
    At the other side, when the current value reach the maximum bounded range, it set automatically the busy property to false.

    Author:
    André Sébastien (divxdede)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setAutoCompletionEnabled

        public void setAutoCompletionEnabled(boolean value)
        Define if the range value must manage the completion automatically. This property is significant only when this model is determinate. When the busy property is set to true the range value is set to the minimum. When the range value reach the maximum, the busy property is set to false.

      • isAutoCompletionEnabled

        public boolean isAutoCompletionEnabled()
        Returns true if the range value must manage the completion automatically. This property is significant only when this model is determinate. When the busy property is set to true the range value is set to the minimum. When the range value reach the maximum, the busy property is set to false.
